name.ja: <ruby>睨<rt>にら</rt></ruby>み<ruby>統<rt>す</rt></ruby>べるスネークアイズ

text.en:
If the total Levels of all "Snake-Eye" monsters you control equal 2 or more: Activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 monster in your opponent's GY or face-up field; place it face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell.
● Target 1 Monster Card on the field treated as a Continuous Spell; Special Summon it to your field.
You can only activate 1 "The Glaring Ruler Snake-Eyes" per turn.
